alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Marshall; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:25AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Joseph, northwestern Marshall, La Porte and southwestern Berrien Counties through 815 AM EDT/715 AM CDT/... At 724 AM EDT/624 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from New Buffalo to near Beverly Shores. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Buffalo around 730 AM EDT. Trail Creek around 735 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Westville, La Porte, New Carlisle, South Bend, Kingsford Heights, Gulivoire Park, Walkerton, North Liberty, Lakeville and Koontz Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 62. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Marshall; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
